page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: We would like to thank all the people mentioned in our investigation for allowing us to come into their homes and for talking to us so freely. Also all the people we stopped in the street. We thank Mr.Brown and Mrs.March, headmaster and headmistress of Brandon Junior and Infants School for allowing us use of the premises to write up our field studies, the 6th formers who helped us and enjoyed it as much as we did, the B.B.C. for encouraging us to find more about the area we live in and Cheryl Smith and Lisa Willey for typing in all the information. Most of all the 39 second year pupils from Durham Johnston School who all live in the area and Mr.Sinclair who grew up there!
